SkillList.name: No Skill
SkillList.Descriptions: No skill

SkillList.name: Retreat
SkillList.Descriptions: Allows the user to move again after attacking but reduces movement by 2.

SkillList.name: Despair
SkillList.Descriptions: Is the unit's HP is below 33%, increase crit rate by 20% and dodge rate by 40%.

SkillList.name: Psychic
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases telekinesis damage by 15% but decreases physical damage by 20%.

SkillList.name: Brute
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases physical damage by 15% but decreases telekinesis damage by 20%.

SkillList.name: Fast Legs
SkillList.Descriptions: Adds one movement.

SkillList.name: Inspired
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases damage dealt by 3 and decreases damage taken by 3 when in movement range of the battalion commander.

SkillList.name: Full of beans
SkillList.Descriptions: Restores blade durability twice as fast.

SkillList.name: Inexhaustible
SkillList.Descriptions: Blade durability never goes down.

SkillList.name: First aid
SkillList.Descriptions: Recovers 10% of max HP at the start of the turn.

SkillList.name: Genius
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases all stat growth by 25%.

SkillList.name: Fast Learner
SkillList.Descriptions: Doubles mastery gains.

SkillList.name: Medic
SkillList.Descriptions: Heals each adjacent friendly unit 10% of their max HP at beginning of turn.

SkillList.name: Fast and Deadly
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases critical chance by Speed/2.

SkillList.name: Invigorating
SkillList.Descriptions: Heals the attacker of 10% of damage dealt.

SkillList.name: Sore Loser
SkillList.Descriptions: If the unit has less health than the enemy after combat, sets the enemy's health points to the unit's.

SkillList.name: Sniper
SkillList.Descriptions: Unit always has 100% hit rate.

SkillList.name: Tempest
SkillList.Descriptions: Doubles Biorhythm effects.

SkillList.name: Nimble
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases dodge rate by 20% and damage taken by 30%.

SkillList.name: Lucky Seven
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases all stats by 7 when last digit of HP is 7.

SkillList.name: Patient
SkillList.Descriptions: Restores twice the durability and 10% of max HP when waiting.

SkillList.name: In Great Shape
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases hit rate and dodge rate by 10% when at max Health.

SkillList.name: Competitive
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases damage dealt by 5 when facing enemy with same blade type.

SkillList.name: Giant Crusher
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases damage dealt to bosses by 10% and decrease damage taken from bosses by 10%

SkillList.name: Last Stand
SkillList.Descriptions: If the Unit is the last one alive, increases all stats by 25%.

SkillList.name: Jack Of All Trades
SkillList.Descriptions: All growths are averaged.

SkillList.name: Solitary
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases damage dealt by 5 if there is no other ally units in 3 tiles range.

SkillList.name: Cleaver
SkillList.Descriptions: Doubles Scythe secondary damage.

SkillList.name: Revenge
SkillList.Descriptions: Missing health is added to damage.

SkillList.name: Killing Spree
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases all stats by 1 for each enemy killed.

SkillList.name: Compassion
SkillList.Descriptions: When healing an ally, recovers the same amount of HP.

SkillList.name: Verso
SkillList.Descriptions: Allows to use remaining movements after action.

SkillList.name: Survivor
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases all stats by 1 every 3 battles survived.

SkillList.name: Focus
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases Telekinesis range by 1.

SkillList.name: Rebound
SkillList.Descriptions: When healing, also heals other allies 5% of the amount.

SkillList.name: Loyal
SkillList.Descriptions: Doubles Commander bonus.

SkillList.name: Bravery
SkillList.Descriptions: If enemy level is higher, increases all stats by 1 per 2 levels.

SkillList.name: Noble Fight
SkillList.Descriptions: Lowers unit and enemy dodge rate by 30%.

SkillList.name: Spite
SkillList.Descriptions: Always counterattacks.

SkillList.name: Thousand Needles
SkillList.Descriptions: Always attacks 3 times, but reduces damage by 50%.

SkillList.name: One for All
SkillList.Descriptions: 50% of damage taken by allies within 3 tiles is transferred to this unit.

SkillList.name: Together we ride
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases all stats by 1 for every 2 allies in 2 tiles.

SkillList.name: Readiness
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases damage by 5% each time unit waits, up to 30%.

SkillList.name: Recklessness
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases damage dealt and taken by 20%.

SkillList.name: Unyielding
SkillList.Descriptions: If at max HP when combat starts, HP cannot go below 1.

SkillList.name: Transparent Crossbow
SkillList.Descriptions: Unit's max HP is 1. Increases all stats by 5.

SkillList.name: Warming Up
SkillList.Descriptions: If unit waits, gains 1 movement for 1 turn.

SkillList.name: Transfuse
SkillList.Descriptions: Exchanges HP % with an ally

SkillList.name: Motivate
SkillList.Descriptions: Allows an ally to act again.

SkillList.name: Swap
SkillList.Descriptions: Exchanges place with an ally.

SkillList.name: Reinvigorate
SkillList.Descriptions: Restores durability of all blades of an ally by 1.

SkillList.name: Jump
SkillList.Descriptions: Moves on the other side of a small wall.

SkillList.name: Fortify
SkillList.Descriptions: Changes tile to Fortification Tile.

SkillList.name: Smoke Bomb
SkillList.Descriptions: Changes tile to Fog Tile.

SkillList.name: Chakra
SkillList.Descriptions: Restores 25% of missing HP.

SkillList.name: Enduring
SkillList.Descriptions: Adds half of missing HP to damage.

SkillList.name: Copy
SkillList.Descriptions: Permanently adds enemy skill to inventory. The user gets a temporary copy of the skill.

SkillList.name: Crystal Heart
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases all growth and exp by 10% (exclusive to Zack).

SkillList.name: Weakness
SkillList.Descriptions: Lowers all stats by 50%.

SkillList.name: Sundance
SkillList.Descriptions: Turns the weather of the tiles at 1 distance to Sunny (only available outside).

SkillList.name: Raindance
SkillList.Descriptions: Turns the weather of the tiles at 1 distance to Rainy (only available outside).

SkillList.name: Amphibian
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases Dodge rate and hit rate by 15% when on a Water or Rainy Tile.

SkillList.name: Shut-in
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases damage by 3 when not on a Sunny Tile but reduces it by 6 otherwise.

SkillList.name: Master Hunter
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases hit rate by 80% and damage by 3 if not wielding any blade (exclusive to Mir).

SkillList.name: Showdown
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases attacker and defender critical rate by 25%.

SkillList.name: Fair Play
SkillList.Descriptions: Decreases attacker and defender critical rate by 25%.

SkillList.name: Friendly
SkillList.Descriptions: Creates Bonds faster.

SkillList.name: Friends are power
SkillList.Descriptions: Doubles Bonds effects.

SkillList.name: Violent Misuse
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases weapon damage by 50% and doubles durability use.

SkillList.name: Redirection
SkillList.Descriptions: Physical dmg is calculated with Resistance and Telekinesis dmg with Defense.

SkillList.name: Blade Conversion
SkillList.Descriptions: Lowers Blade durability to zero to regain 50% max HP.

SkillList.name: Blade Sacrifice
SkillList.Descriptions: Sacrifices 50% of max HP to fully replenish durability of equipped blade.

SkillList.name: Guardian Spirit
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases all stat growth and exp gained by 10% (exclusive to Kira).

SkillList.name: Hero's Heir
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases all stat growth and exp gained by 10% (exclusive to Gale).

SkillList.name: Eye of Shining Justice
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases Damage by 100, reduces damage taken by 100. (for Debug use).

SkillList.name: Dried
SkillList.Descriptions: Negates the effects of the Desert.

SkillList.name: Taunt
SkillList.Descriptions: Forces enemies to target this unit until the next turn.

SkillList.name: Caelum General
SkillList.Descriptions: Reduce damage taken by 50% and always counterattacks.

SkillList.name: Overly Caustious
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases dodge rate by 20% but reduces crit chance by 30%.

SkillList.name: Break
SkillList.Descriptions: Deals durability damage proportional to strength.

SkillList.name: Brawl Master
SkillList.Descriptions: Increases hit rate by Dexterity*5 and physical damage by Strength/4 if not wielding any blade.

SkillList.name: Hook
SkillList.Descriptions: Drags a character up to 3 tiles away next to the user if their resistance is lower than the user's psyche.

SkillList.name: Throw
SkillList.Descriptions: Throws a character next to the user up to 3 tiles away if their defense is lower than the user's strength.
